Class Pentomino

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pentomino

  • public class Pentomino
extends java.lang.Object
    The Pentomino class creates every possible pentomino.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pentomino(char type)
      Creates the object based on what shape the users wants it to be
